item.title: Helix Keymap
item.description: ================================================================= = CHAPTER 1 RECAP = Use the h,j,k,l keys to move the cursor. Type : to enter Command mode. The q / quit and q! / quit! commands will exit Helix. The former fails when there are unsaved changes. The latter discards them. The w / write command will save the file. The wq / write-quit command will do both. Type d to delete the character at the cursor.
